column4: On  perusal  of the  judgment  of the  learned  High  Court  Judge  we

column5: learned  High  Court  Judge  has  correctly  analysed

column3: evidence and  convicted  the appellant.  We see no  reason  to  set aside a
well considered judgment. We affirm the judgment dated 15/11/2016 and

column5: JUDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL
JUDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL
